TransactionStateContext.DepositState: When users send ether and the Deposit function is called, user balances are updated.
TransactionStateContext.CashOutState: When users withdraw ether via the CashOut function, their balances are updated accordingly.

ExternalInteractions.ETHTransfers: The contract transfers ether between users and the contract address in both the Deposit and CashOut functions.
ExternalInteractions.LogContract: Calls to an external logging contract (TransferLog) to record transactions.
